name: Tanks V Zombies
description:
A collision of 2 ideas, Tanks V Zombies is an isometric survival game where you and a friend must fend off a ravenous horde of zombies. Luckily for the both of you, you're in tanks. Drive, shoot, and work together to fend off the undead. Featuring...

  • Two Player Co-op
  • Fast-Paced Gameplay
  • Explodable Objects!
    • https://imgur.com/a/YzxEzs4
  • Wave after Wave of Enemies

This game is a mashup of the Unity Learn Tanks Tutorial and the Survival Shooter Tutorial.

Tanks Tutorial

Survival Shooter Tutorial
